E aprop tu inscideys la adherencia am spatum subtil, le qual no sia am acuitat de las inscisios, habantz obtus un petit per so que·l malaute no sia inquietat deves la operacio, e remau le spatum que no ledesca le huel am la sua acuitat.	"And then you should cut the adhesion with a fine spatula that is not sharp for incisions, having it obtuse at one end so that the patient is not disturbed during the operation, and remove the spatula without letting it scratch the eye with its sharpness."
E sia la tua inscizio quays excorjan aquela adherencia am facilitat entro que sia retornada la palpebra segon la sua forma natural e que sia sanada tota la adherencia.	"And your incision should be such that it easily removes that adhesion so that the eyelid may return to its natural form and all of the adhesion is healed."
E aprop tu met en le huel aygua salada am la qual tu laves; o distilla en lu de zunia dissolvut en l’aygua.	"And then you should put into the eye saltwater with which you wash it; or else distill in it a solution of juniper dissolved in water."
E aprop separa entre la palpebra e l’huel am calgua de li, e pausa sobre le huel lana infuza en album de huou, e aprop le tertz jorn usa de causas consolidativas entro que sia sanat.	"And then separate between the eyelid and the eye with gauze from it, and place over the eye a compress of wool infused in egg white, and then on the third day apply healing remedies so that it may be healed."
Capitol .xvi.	"Chapter XVI"
De inscizio de ungla e de eminencia de carn dels lacrimals.	"The cutting of a nail and the prominence of flesh around the lachrymals."
Sapias que ungla es segon dos manieyras, quar o es nervosa, e es semblant a ciphac dur subtil; o es no-nervosa, semblant a humiditat blanca congilada, la qual quan ferr la toca, o es forsat aquela prendre am onci, es abscindida e le onci no es ficat en lu.	"Know that a nail can be in two ways: either it is nervous, and is like hard bone that is subtle; or it is non-nervous, like congealed white humidity, which when iron touches it, if it is forced to take it, it is cut off and the iron does not go into it."
E amdos las specias no comensan sino del lacrimal major entro que va petit a petit que cobre la vista e prohibeys le lum e·l movement de huel.	"And both species do not begin except from the larger lacrimal, which goes little by little to cover the eye and prohibit light and its movement."
Mays la manieyra del obrar en la inscizio de lu es que·l malaute pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop obre les huels de lu, e eleva la palpebra am la tua ma, e aprop colligeys la ungla am onci de pauca duplicacio e exten aquela a las partidas desus.	"But the manner of operating in the cutting of it is that the patient should hold his head steady with his own hands, and he opens the eyelids of it, and lifts up the eyelid with your hand, and then carefully takes hold of the nail with a pair of forceps with little duplication, and stretches it upwards."
E aprop pren una agula e entromet en aquela un pel de cavalh o de buou o de vaqua, o de semblantz, o de fiel fort, o duplica la extremitat de la agulha petit a petit e fica aquela en le mieg de la ungla, e penetra aquela am la agulha, e lia am fiel la ungla; e exten aquela a las partidas desus, e excorja am le pel le latz de la ungla lo qual siec la pupilla.	"And then take an awl and insert it into that a little bit of horse or cow or ox or similar hair, or strong silk thread, duplicate the tip of the needle little by little and put it in the middle of the nail, and penetrate it with the needle, and tie the nail with the thread; and stretch it upwards, and strip off from the side of the nail with the hair what was covering the pupil."
E ayssi tu sieguas aquela am le pel entro al derier de lu.	"And thus you should follow that one with the hair behind it."
E aprop tu inscideys le romanent en la razitz del lacrimal am spatum subtil o am petitas forfexs, e leysa la carn del lacrimal natural per so que per inscizio de aquela no endevengua fluxs de lagremas continuabla.	"And then you incise the remnant in the root of the lacrimal with a fine spatula or small forceps, and lift up the skin of the natural lacrimal to ensure that by cutting it there will be no continuous flow of tears."
E alscunas vetz la ungla am le sol onci estenduda o am fiel, ayssi co havem dit, e aprop sia excurjat am spatum leon del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	"And sometimes the nail with its sole extended upwards or tied as we have said, and then strip off with this spoon which is its shape:"
E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	"And take care that with the spoon you do not touch the corneal tunic and that there should be a rupture in it, and that the pupil is pierced."
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	"And then place in the wound a little bit of salted tincture or clean cheese rennet, and leave it overnight; and then cure it with water that is necessary until it heals."
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	"And if the nail is not nerve-rich and you cannot insert the needle nor can it be attached with the hook, then in many cases this type of nail is cured with medicines, and is healed as you have seen and is described in the division."
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	"And if you wish to incise it, then open the wound of the ailment and take a fine spoon with sharp edges shaped like this:"
am subtilitat.	"with fineness."
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	"And if sometimes that is rarefied and contracted and pressed against the root, then distill from your ear into the wound of clean cheese rennet or clean rose oil or salted tincture, and fill the wound overnight."
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	"And then repeat the operation over it until everything that is of it is removed, except for the contrary aposteme which should remain in the wound, because when you leave it, and cure the aposteme at the beginning so that it heals."
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	"And then repeat your operation over it with reason until it is healed."
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	"The prominence of the lacrimal caruncle, if it is noticed in the wound due to great harm, should be suspended with a hook; and cut off its tip with one stroke without extending the incision lest tears flow."
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	"And then distill into the lacrimal clean rose oil and cheese rennet until it heals."
Capitol .xvii.	"Chapter XVII."
De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	"Of incision of a pimple and of what is born of skin adhered in the wound."
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	"Sometimes in the wounds of some eyes, rough skin is born which covers the pupil or comes close to it and sticks out over the eyelids, and presses them together tightly at their edges like a ballast stone."
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	"But the operation in this case is that the ailment stops the head of the thread from going out; and then open the wounds of that one and collect all that skin with appropriate hooks according to what you have, and take it with a forceps or tweezers; and then incise the skin at the beginning until everything is finished with the scissors, taking care not to damage the wound during your operation."
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	"And let your incision be with the one with which you cut those or with the spoon that we have described in the incision of the nail, or with small forceps with which ascites is collected according to what will come up in this chapter."
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	"Therefore when your incision is completed and all that skin is removed, then fill the wound with salted tincture or distill into it rough powder similar to that of corrosive medicines, and cover it from outside with egg white until it is assured against a dry aposteme."
E si roman alcuna causa de alguardenici e es senhoragat sanc caut, e temes apostema caut, lahoras leyssa le huel e cura aquela apostema am aquo que ceda aquela apostema, e aprop itera sobre aquel am operacio entro que sia sanat, e semblantment fay en la carn ajustada la qual accideys en le huel de aquesta especia.	"And if some cause of a pimple remains and is severely inflamed with cauterization dryness, and you fear a dry aposteme, then leave the wound and cure that aposteme with what will heal it; and then repeat the operation over it until it heals, and do likewise for adhered skin which occurs in this type of wound."
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	"But however you must avoid all cure of the wound by natural means or by chance operation with iron, and do not put your hand in any of these operations until you see that that member can withstand this operation."
Capitol .xviii.	"Chapter XVIII."
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	"Of collection of pus in the wound."
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	"Pus is rough matter that is thickened over the wound and prevents its operation from being seen, making it difficult for many days."
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	"Therefore at the beginning you must consider whether the wound in which pus is present is strong and does not have another ailment besides pus; then collect that pus."
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	"And when you command the ailment to stop its head from going out, then suspend those veins with one hook or two according to your judgment; and let that hook be of subtle duplication in this form:"
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	"or thus two hooks graduated in one body in this form:"
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	"And then let those veins be collected with subtle forceps subtly and remove the blood little by little until you see that those veins are removed from the wound and turned over."
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	"And take care not to damage the wound with the ends of the spoon; and if your operation is done in midday before the sun, be very careful in your operation so that you do not cut anything but those veins."
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	"And when you have completed it, then distill into the wound chief wine or rough to help dissolve what has been removed from the pus."
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible colligeys tot en aquela hora, e lahoras tu emplastra tot am aquo que cede la dolor de lu, e leyssa lu per alcus dias entro que sia sedada la dolor de lu e que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	"But if that is not possible for you to collect everything at once, then plaster it all with what relieves its pain, and leave it for a few days until the pain of it has subsided and it is assured against a dry aposteme."
E aprop itera sobre lu segon que la mateyssa manieyra entro que sia sanat.	"And then repeat over it according to what the most expert manner requires until it heals."
E aquesta es la forma de las forfexs:	"And this is the form of the forceps:"
Capitol .xix.	"Chapter XIX."
De reduccio de arizati al nas.	"Of reduction of nasal bleeding."
Quan tu curas arisati am cauteri o am medicina aguda comburent segon que es precedida la narracio de lu e no es sanat, lahoras no es engen en lu sino que fendas sobre le apostema deves la maturitat de lu, e que extraguas tota la humiditat la qual es en lu e·l poyre entro que sia descubert le os.	"When you treat nasal bleeding with cautery or sharp burning medicine according to what is precedented in it and it does not heal, then do not rely on it but cut over the aposteme where it has reached maturity and extract all the moisture that is in it and the bone until it becomes visible."
E donc cum es descubert le os e vezes en lu corrupcio o negror, lahoras tu ratz lu am un sturment del qual aquesta es la forma:	"And then when the bone has been discovered and you see corruption or blackness in it, then scrape it with an instrument of which this is the form:"
E es nompnat de aspre cap, e sia feyt de fer indi, e sia le cap redon ayssi cum asir le qual sia fayt punctat per punctacio de lima o aliskalfati per punctacio subtil (ayssi cum es en la forma seguent).	"And it is called the sharp point and it should be made of iron, and its head should be round thus that you can grasp it like this which has been pierced by the piercing of a file or delicately by subtle piercing (as in the following form)."
E pausa aquel sobre le loc corrumput del os, e aprop revolveys aquel entre les tieus ditz, e prem la tua ma petit a petit entro que sapias que aquela corropcio es rasa.	Place that over the corrupt spot on the bone, then rotate it between your fingers and press gently until you know that corruption is scraped away.
E aquo sia fayt alcunas veguadas, e aprop restaura le loc am causas exsiccativas e stipticas.	After doing this several times, then restore the location with drying and astringent agents.
Donc si·l loc es consolidat e es en lu nascuda bona carn e es abscindit le cors de la sania e roman per xl dias, e no es renovat e no es apostemat e no accideys en lu accident, lahoras tu sapias que es sanat.	And if the location is consolidated and has good new flesh growing, and there is no infection or suppuration, nor any signs of relapse after 40 days, then you will know that it is healed.
E sino, lahoras no es en lu engen sino reduzir la fissura a la forma del nas, e segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu descuebras de segon os am ferr o am medicina acuta, e cum sira descubert le os, lahoras tu pren tribo segon aquesta forma:	And if it is not, then it should be reduced to the shape of the nose using this method: first, expose the bone with a saw or sharp medicine, and once exposed, take a chisel...
Sia la extramitat de lu ferr triangulada, e·l fust de lu sia prim extenuat entro a la extremitat ayssi cum vezes assi.	The outer part of the chisel should be triangular, and its handle thinly tapered towards the tip.
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le os, e sia aquel prop del lacrimal; e alongua la tua ma un pauc del huel, e aprop revol la tua ma am le tribo entro que penetre tot le os, e aquel sente le malaute per asso que atroba vent yssir per so quan te la sua ma.	Place the chisel on the bone near the lacrimal duct; then hold your hand a little above it and rotate the chisel with your hand until it penetrates all the way through the bone, and you feel that air can pass through when you remove your hand.
Donc lahoras restaura le loc am medicinas stipticas exsiccantz ayssi cum t’e eyssenhat.	Then restore the area with astringent drying medicines as before.
Donc cum nays la carn e·l loc es endurazit, lahoras la materia la qual effundia a las partidas deforo retorna al nas, donc aquo es pus leugier sobre le malaute.	And when the flesh has grown and the area is hardened, then the material that previously flowed out will return to the nose, which makes the condition easier to bear.
Capitol .xx.	Chapter XX.
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	On the reduction of a nasal hump
Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	When the nose is entirely humped and there are no signs of damage or reduction, then it is necessary to relieve the condition by following these steps:
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	"The manner of powders is that you should take linen cloths cut in four folds."
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	"And then place those on top of each other according to the quantity that you may need."
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	"And then place a hard cloth with strong binding on top of them; and apply the cupping glasses with suction without scarification; and then remove the cupping glasses, leaving him/her tight for the day and night."
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	"But if during this time the binding becomes loose, it should be tightened immediately."
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	"And then remove the bandage in the morning and night as we have said."
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	"And if sometimes he/she is reduced, that's good; but if not, then apply the plaster with powders and binding and cupping glasses until healed."
Capitol .xxi.	"Chapter XXI"
De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	"Of the incision of the prominence of the uveal tunic."
Quan endeve disrupcio en la tunica uvea, e aprop es eminent e procezeys fora las palpebras ayssi cum un gra de rasim, e es orrazada la forma de home per aquo, e vols aquo inscidir, lahoras la operacio en lu es ayssi cum havem recomtat, que tu entrometas la agula en la razitz de la uvea de la partida dejos en la partida desus, e aprop met la agula autra en la qual sia fil doble de la part del lacrimal, e fay aquela penetrar e leyssa la primieyra agula segon la sua disposicio; e aprop inscideys le loc del fiel doble e leva am aquel la partida de la uvea en le circuit de la agula, e strenh aquela mot.	"When there is a rupture in the uveal tunic and it protrudes from the eyelids like a grain of wheat, and you want to incise that prominence, then the operation is as follows: insert the needle into the groove of the uvea where it enters above, and also insert another needle through which a doubled thread has been passed on the side of the lacrimal duct. Make the first needle penetrate and leave the first needle according to its position; then incise the location of the doubled thread and pull with that the prominence of the uvea along the circumference of the needle, and tighten it well."
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	"And then remove the needle and apply over the wound a bandage infused in egg white; leave it until the thread is absorbed with the uvea."
E aprop cura le huel am aquo que conforte aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	"And then heal the wound with whatever comforts it until the inflammation has healed."
E alcunas veguadas aduna de tota partida am cercle de drap entro le huel ajuste eminencia gran, e aprop sia perforat am le spatum subtil que vengua al preon del huel, e corra la humiditat albuginea, e descen le huel e intra tantost.	"And sometimes it happens that the entire prominence is gathered together with a circle of cloth around the wound; then it should be punctured with a fine spatula that comes to the front of the wound, and let the mucoid humor flow out, and lower the eyelid promptly."
E aprop strenh entro que sia sanat.	"And then tighten until healed."
Capitol .xxii.	"Chapter XXII"
De curacio de alconati.	"Of the treatment of ophthalmia."
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	"This condition called ophthalmia is nothing but sanies, which adheres to the eyelid like descending water, and it is not that."
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	"The manner of treating it is that you should make the person sit on an equipped and straight chair; then take their head in your hands with two fingers and press until you see the sanies coming out from the corners of the eyes. Then dry it up so that it does not descend, and cover the light, and the cause of the illness will be seen as follows:"
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	"And if it does not descend downwards, know that it is water."
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	"But if the descent of the sanies is not prepared as we have said, then make the person sit between your palms and take a fine spatula and pass it over the surrounding panicle slightly beyond the continuation of the conjunctiva with the tunic of the cornea at the limbus (that is to say), until the sanies has been evacuated."
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel.	"Then once it has been evacuated, you should distill onto the eye cold water in which honey has been mixed or boiled water with ground fenugreek and honey."
E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	"And then treat them according to the other causes until healed."
Capitol .xxii.	"Chapter XXII"
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	"Of the treatment of descending water from the belly."
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.	"We have already spoken about the types of water in the division and which is suitable for perforating according to what we declared earlier, now that one according to health."
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre un cayrat e lia le sieu huel sa, lu mot stringent.	"You should now make the patient lie on their back on a bed and tie their belly with a string tightly."
E aprop pausa prop de la palpebra del sieu huel la tua ma senestra, si le huel en le qual es l’aygua es le huel senestra; o am la tua ma dreyta, si le huel es le dextre.	"And place your left hand near the eyelid of their left belly if the water is in the left side of the belly; or with your right hand if it is on the right side."
E aprop am la tua ma dextra pren almagda, si le huel es senestre; o am la tua ma senestra, si le huel es de dreyt.	"And with your right hand take a magnet if the belly is left [sided]; or with your left hand if it is on the right side."
E aprop pausa la extremitat de almagda prop de la corona per la grossesa del ray en le album del huel de part del mendre lacrimal, e aprop enpelleys almagda am vertut e revol la tua ma am aquel.	"And place the tip of the magnet near the crown of the head according to the thickness of the ray in the belly from the side of the tear duct, and quickly attract the magnet with force while turning your hand towards it."
E aprop penetre en le album del huel e sentas que almagda ja es pervenguda a causa vueda.	"And enter into the belly through the tear duct and make sure that the magnet has reached its target."
E cove que sia la masura del cami de almagda al preon la mesura del spazi le qual es de la pupilla entro a la fi de la negror, e es la corona del huel; quar tu veyras am aquel pupilla am la visio de l’huel per la clartat de la tunica cornea.	"And ensure that the length of the magnet's path is equal to the distance from the pupil to the end of the darkness, which is the crown of the belly; because you will see the pupil through the clarity of the cornea with your vision."
E aprop pausa almagda entro al loc en le qual es l’aygua, e aprop tu la atira en jos una veguada aprop autra, e donc si la aygua descen tantost, lahoras vetz le malaute aquo sobre le qual huebre la sua vista tantost, e almagda en le sieu huel.	"And then place the magnet into the location where there is water, and quickly pull it down once or twice, and if the water goes down immediately, then at that moment the patient's sight will be restored, and the magnet will remain in its belly."
E aprop repausa se un pauc; donc si la aygua es descenduda, lahoras tu depausa aquela autre veguada abantz que almagda ne sia getada.	"And then pause for a moment; if the water has gone down, then quickly pull it back again before the magnet is thrown out."
E donc quan es sicada e no descen, lahoras tu extrat almagda am facilitat, e revol am aquel la tua ma pauc a pauc, e aprop dissolveys en l’aygua un petit de sal clara de gemma e am aquela lava le huel dedintz; e aprop pausa fora le huel coto o stopa o lana infusa en oli rozat e album de huou e ligua am aquo le huel sa.	"And then when it has gone down and no longer descends, carefully extract the magnet, turning your hand slowly, and dissolve a little bit of clear gemstone salt in water and wash the belly inside with that; then cover the belly outside with cotton or stop it with wool infused in rose oil and album of hen's egg, and tie it with that."
Mays nos e aquels que so de nostre temps pause sobre aquel comi trissat am album de huou.	"But those who are of our time pause over this remedy with the albumen of a hen."
E si no obezeys a tu almagda al intrament de l’huel per la sua duricia — quar es alcu dels homes del qual le huel es dur mot —, lahoras cove que prenguas le spatum le qual es nompnat alberid del qual aquesta es la forma:	"And if the magnet does not obey you when entering the belly due to its hardness — because some men have very hard bellies — then you should take the spatula which is called an albarello, the shape of which is as follows:"
E donc perfora am aquel aquela conjunctura, e no ultimes la tua ma en le trauc, e no es si no que fassas via ad almagda loc subtil.	"And then pierce with it that junction, and do not bring your hand out of the track, and if you cannot find a way to lead the magnet to its subtle place."
E aprop entromet almagda segon que havem dit.	"And then introduce the magnet as we have said."
E deves le compliment de la tua obra, sia preparat al malaute dormitori descentment fayt en le qual dorma sobre le sieu dos en mayson tenebrosa, e sia prohibit de totz movementz .	"And you must complete your work by having the patient lie down to sleep in a room that is dark and quiet, where he should lie on his back without moving at all."
E pausa en la natura de lu aquo per que sia linida la sua natura, e no maugua le sieu cap a la partida dreyta ni senestra de tot.	"And pause for a moment to observe the nature of the water so that its nature is clarified, and do not move his head to either the right or left at all."
E sia le liament segon la sua disposicio entro al tertz dia.	"And apply the remedy according to the patient's condition on the third day."
E aprop deslia aquel en aquela maysso tenebrosa e exproha la freol vista, e fay li vezer alcunas causas, e aprop retorna le liament entro al dia .vii.	"And then remove him from that dark room and expose him to bright light, show him various things, and then return the remedy on the seventh day."
E no cove que fassas aquo en la hora de las curacios o tantost aprop la infusio.	"And you should not do this at the time of bleeding or immediately after an infusion."
Habantz cove que tu alienes aquo per so quar la aygua puega leugierament per gran e vehement de reguardament.	"Take care to keep this secret because water can easily take on great and violent properties due to its nature."
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que deslias le huel denant le vii dia, e rectifica aquel am aquo que ceda apostema.	"But if an abscess forms, then you should remove the bandage from the belly on the seventh day, and correct it with something that will draw out the abscess."
Lahoras tu absol la vista de lu e pausa sobre la cara de lu oral per le qual sia regit le vezement de lu dejos lu per alcus dias, lu existent en la mayszo tenebrosa.	"And then uncover his eyes and observe his facial expression to see how well he is recovering from his illness by keeping him in the dark room for a few days."
E aprop sia gitat de aquela mayzo gradantment e conversa8 en las suas causas.	"And then gradually take him out of that darkness and have him discuss various things with you."
E sapias que in alchatea no es excusat le discipol de visio alcunas veguadas, e lahoras tu sias ardit sobre la operacio.	"And know that in Alchemy, the disciple of vision sometimes sees certain visions, and therefore be prepared for this operation."
E ja es pervengut a nos de alcu de aquels les quals so al Artach , e alcu disse que fayt foc en al Ayrac magdaam perforat am le qual es succada la aygua.	"And it has been brought to our attention that some of those who practice Alchemy have said that fire is made in the magnet, which is pierced with a tube through which water is sucked up."
Mays empero yeu non e vist degu en la nostra terra le qual haia perfeyt aquo, ni e aquo legit en alcu dels libres dels antics; e es possible que aquo sia novel.	"But we have not seen anything like this in our land nor is it written about in any of the ancient books that we know of. Therefore, this may be a novelty."
E aquestas so las formas de las specias de magdaan per que sia sobre aquelas aquel le qual ignora aquelas:	"And these are the forms of the species of magnet which we have mentioned above for those who do not know them:"
E sian faytas de eram o de ferr propriament, e sian las extramitatz de lor am aquesta subtilitat triangulada, la extremitat aguda ayssi cum aquela es la forma.	"And they are made of iron or proper steel, and their extremities are made with this triangular subtlety, the pointed extremity being like this:"
Capitol .xxiv.	"Chapter XXIV."
De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.	"Of the treatment of flesh torn in the nose."
Quan en le nas so nascudas carns diversas ajustadas de las quals es alcuna causa la qual es assemblada a scorpio de motz pes, o a polip peys; e aquesta malautia es apelada polipus quar es a semblansa de aquel peys representat.	When flesh of diverse colors grows in the nose, which some say is due to a heavy scorpion or a large polyp, and this illness is called polyps because it resembles that fish.
E de lu es carn cancrosa, lapadea, de fusca color; e de lu es que es carn leon no de color fusca.	And its flesh is cancerous, ulcerated, dark-colored; and the flesh of the lion is not of dark color.
Donc en aquela que es en aquestas carns leon no fraudulenta ni cancroza, cove que fassas le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e posat al solelh, e huebre las nars de lu, e picoys le tieu onci en aquelas carns.	Therefore, in that which is not fraudulent nor cancerous lion flesh, you should place the sick person's hands between your breasts and put them in the sun, and cover their nose and ears with that flesh.
E aprop extrat aquela a las partidas deforo, e aprop inscindeys aquo que has comprehendut de aquelas am spatum agut subtil de la una partida entro que sapias que tota la carn ja es ostada; que si roman de lu deguna causa de la qual la abscisio es possibla, lahoras tu ratz aquo am la un dels estrumentz subtils am facilitat entro que de lu romangua denguna causa.	And properly extract that from the external parts, and properly cut with a sharp, subtle knife what you have grasped of those parts when you know that all the flesh is removed; for if anything remains there due to some cause which makes excision possible, then quickly remove it with one of the subtle instruments with ease where nothing remains.
Mays si senhoreja am sanc o accida apostema caut, lahoras tu pausa a lu aquo que cove; o es dels apostemas malignes, lahoras tu coyta e cauteriza aquel entro que sia abscindit sanc e sian ostadas las cavas totas.	But if there is an ulcer with sanguineous matter or an aposteme that is cauterized, then you should do what is necessary; but if it is of malignant ulcers, then you should cut and cauterize until the sanguineous matter is removed and all the cavities are opened.
E aprop sia getatz en le nas aprop la inscizio vi agre e aygua o vi.	And properly apply to the wound a dressing with wine and honey or wine.
Mays si le nas es ubert e de lu procezeys humiditat entro al palat, lahoras sapias que ja es sanat.	But if the wound is open and there proceeds from it humidity towards the palate, then you should know that it has already healed.
Mays si la humiditat no penetra segon que cove, lahoras tu sapias que dedintz lu es carn nada en los pus sobiras osses de las nars als quals non es pervengut abscizio.	But if the humidity does not penetrate as it should, then you know that within it there is flesh still adhering to the overlying bones of the nostrils where excision has not reached.
Donc lahoras cove que entromitas fiel de li al qual sia alcuna grosseza, e nuza en lu motz nuzes, e pausa entre quascun nutz la quantitat del dit o mens, e engene le malaute e entromet una extremitat del fiel en le nars am lo ray o am autra causa la qual es a lu possibla.	Therefore, you should insert a thread of sufficient thickness into it and twine it with numerous knots, leaving between each knot the quantity of a finger or less, and then apply it to the patient's nostril with a hook or any other means which is possible for him.
E pus que aquo aura fayt, que atire le sieu odorament entro que pervengua a las canals de las nars, e sia eyssit sobre le sieu golayro, quar tropas veguadas le semblant ad aquesta accio fan les enfantz a las scolas, e es leugiera causa ad aquel que ho vol far.	And after this is done, have him inhale the odor of something pleasant until it reaches the canals of the nostrils, and let him blow his nose into his garment, for many people commonly do this action in schools, and it will be easier for him who wishes to do so.
E aprop pausa las dos extramitatz del fiel, una extremitat que iesca sobre le nas et l’autra que romangua en le nas, e aprop aministra serratura de carn am les nuzes que so en le fiel, e fay aquo entro que sapias que las carn ja so am les nuzes del fiel.	And properly tie the two extremities of the thread, one extremity which comes out over the nose and the other which remains inside the nose, and apply a suture of flesh with the knots that are on the thread, and do this until you know that the flesh is attached to the knots of the thread.
E aprop extratz le fiel, e pausa en le nas aprop la abstraccio del sanc una calgua , e fay aquo per tres dias o mays entro que l’enguent corrodo tot aquo que es romas de las carns.	And then remove the thread and apply to the nose a bandage with honey, and do this for three days or more until the dressing has eaten away all that is left of the flesh.
E aprop en la fi de la causa, pausa en le nas una canula de plom per alscus jorns entro que sia sanat.	And finally, apply to the nose a lead cannula for several days until it is healed.
Mays si endigeys de curacio que exsique, usa de aquela.	But if you wish for a drying cure, use that one.
E aquesta es la forma del instrument a capipurge fazedor am le qual son distillatz olis e medicinas en le nars:	"And this is how the purge maker instrument works, with which oils and medicines are distilled into the nose:"
E fay aquo de argent o de eram, la qual sia semblant a una petita lampesa uberta, ayssi cum petita conqua, e le meat semblantment.	"And make of silver or copper, resembling a small lantern opened like this, similarly to a small shell, with the mouth likewise."
E si vols, fay una canula clausa ayssi cum cana, e la cancula del estrument a capipurge fazedor e sia plana, descuberta; a la qual sia manubre en lo derier de lu, am le qual tenguas aquela quan escaufas en lu oli o aquo que tu vols dels sucs e de las causas suctiblas.	"And if you wish, make a closed cannula like this, and the cannula of the purge maker instrument should be flat and open; hold it at the end with your hand when you pour oil or water into it from the succulent causes."
E aquestz capipurgi es precios: recipe de enforbi de castor, de balayra blanc, de giengiebre, e piletre de safra, de pebre lonc, de escafragia, de epetum de spic ana unc. vi cumfizeys am suc de bleda e de caul, e sian faytas pillulas, e sia destemprada una pillula am aygua tebeza, e sia gitat en las nars del malaute jasent envers.	"And this purge is priced: take of each costus, white balm, ginger, saffron, long pepper, scammony, ephedra, and anise, six ounces; compound them with the juice of beetroot and leek, make pills thereof, temper one pill with warm water, and administer it to the patient lying down."
Capitol .xxv.	Here is Chapter XXV
De theyls natz en las extramitatz del nas.	On the holes made in the outer parts of the nose.
Motas veguadas es nat theyl en las extramitatz del nas, e es magnificat e omentat en alscus dias entro en que mot es leg le reguardament de lu.	Frequently it is necessary to make holes in the outer parts of the nose, and it is greatly praised and commended in those days when much care is taken for its regard.
E per aquo cove que tu inscidas aquel en le comensament de la apparissio de lu, e erediques tot aquel.	And therefore you should insert that at the beginning of the appearance of that, and remove all of it.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc o cauteri o medicina comburent la qual estia en loc de lu.	And afterwards apply a poultice or cautery or burning medicine to the place where it is located.
Mays si es tardada la sua inscizio entro que sia magnificat, lahoras considera si es lapificat, dur, de fusca color e de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr quar es apostema crancos; quar motas veguadas ad aquel que inscideys aquesta apostema endeve per lu granda malicia sobre aquel le qual aquel havia.	But if its incision is delayed until it becomes magnified, then consider whether it is blackish, hard, of dark color and of little sensation; then do not touch it with iron because it is a malignant abscess. For often that which you cut into this abscess will bring great mischief to him upon whom it was.
E si le apostema es de leon tocament e no es de fosca color, e vezes que inscizio es possibla en tot aquel, lahoras evacua le malaute e inscideys aquel senes temor, e cura le loc am aquo que exsique e costrenh entro que sia sanat.	And if the abscess is of light touch and not of dark color, and sometimes incision is possible in all of it, then evacuate the patient and cut into it without fear, and cure the place with that which dries and constrains until it is healed.
Capitol .xxvi.	Here is Chapter XXVI:
De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.	On the suture of the nose, lips, and ear when continuity is dissolved by wound or ulcer.
Sapias que quan accideys solucio de continuitat en una de aquestas cartillages, pauc confereys en aquela operacio sino en alcus homes.	Know that when you encounter dissolution of continuity in one of these cartilage, pay little attention to this operation unless you are among certain men.
Donc cove, quan endeve ad alcu alcuna causa de aquelas, que consideres si es plagua fresca am le sieu sanc, e lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Therefore, when you find some cause of these, such as a fresh wound with its blood, then join the two lips of the wound with suture and apply cure until it is healed.
E si las labias de solucio de continuitat so ja separadas, e quascuna es fayta sana, lahoras cove que tu excorjes quascuna partida de la sua codena apparent entro que n’iesca sanc.	And if the lips of dissolved continuity are already separated and each is quite healthy, then you must excise each part from its visible root until there comes forth no blood.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias am sutura e strenh aquelas, e sobre aquelas pulveriza sanc de drago e enses trissat, e pausa sobre la polvera una pessa de emplaustra diafinicon, o de alcu autre dels emplastres consolidatius, e leyssa aquel liat per dos jorns o per tres, e aprop deslia aquel e permuta aquel emplaustre e leyssa aquel entro que·ls fiels per si sian abscinditz, e aprop cura am enguent entro que sia sanat.	And then join the two lips with suture and strengthen them, and over them sprinkle dragon's blood powder and some rue powder, and apply a piece of diaphoretic plaster or some other consolidating plaster upon the powder, and let it lie for two or three days. Then remove it, change the plaster, and allow the wounds to close by themselves. Afterwards cure with ointment until they are healed.
Mays la manieyra de la sutura es que tu agregues la solucio de continuitat o am agulhas ayssi cum havem recomtat en la sutura del ventre, o agregua la solucio de continuitat am fiel ayssi cum a tu e fayt saber.	But the manner of suture is that you should join the dissolution of continuity with needles as we have described in the suture of the belly, or join it with a thread as you know how to do.
Capitol .xxvii.	Here is Chapter XXVII:
De extraccio de aquela causas que veno en las doas labias en las partidas dedintz.	Of extraction of those causes that appear in the two lips inside
Motas veguadas endeve a motz homes en las partidas dedintz de las suas labias alcus apostemas durs semblantz a gras de errs, e alscunas de lors son mendres e alcunas son majors.	Often seen in some men inside the parts of their lips certain hard tumors resembling grains of barley, and some are smaller and others larger.
Donc cove que tu convertas las labias e fendas quascuna de aquelas duricias de tota part, e aprop la abscizio umpliscas le loc de sagi trissat entro que·l sanc sia restrengut, e aprop sia lavat am vi agre e sia curat le loc am aquo que es stipticitat, entro que sia sanat.	Therefore you should turn back the lips and split each of those hardnesses on all sides, and afterwards perform the excision by filling up the place with saffron thoroughly ground until it is tightened, and then wash it with vinegar and dress the wound with astringent water, until it is healed.
Capitol .xxviii.	Capítulo XXVIII
De inscizio de la carn ajustada en las gengivas.	Of the incision of attached flesh in the gums
Granre de veguadas nays sobre la gengiva carn ajustada la qual les antics apelero albulus, adonc cove que tu suspendas aquela am onci o que tenguas aquela am las forfecs e inscidas aquela deves la sua razit, e leyssas la sania correr o le sanc.	Often when there is a swelling above the attached gum which the ancients called albus, then you should suspend that with a ligature or hold it with forceps and incise it along its length, and let the sanies flow out and the blood.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc sagi trissat o autra polveras stipticas o excicativas.	And afterwards apply saffron thoroughly ground or other astringent or excitative powders.
E si aquela carn retorna, lahoras inscideys aquela segundariament, e cauterisa aquela, quar aprop le cauteri no retornara.	And if that flesh returns again, incise it once more and cauterize it, because then it will not return.
Capitol .xxix.	Capítulo XXIX
De razo de dentz am ferr.	"Due to iron teeth."
Quan en la superficia de las dentz de las partidas dedintz e de las de foro e entre las gingivas so ajustadas escorsas aspras, legas, e alcunas veguadas son de nigradas e son faytas citrinas o vertz entro que a la gingiva ve per aquo corrupcio e son faytas las dentz legas.	"If on the surface of the teeth in dental sockets and those of the foreskin, between the gums are rough, hard, sometimes blackened and are made yellow or greenish that goes through the gum for this corruption and the teeth are loose."
E donc cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas e pausar le cap de lu en le tieu se, e ratz las dents en las quals apareysso aquelas escorsas e causas semblantz arena entro que de lor no romangua deguna causa, e aquo fay de la negror e de la citrinitat e de las autras entro que sian mondificadas.	"And therefore you should seize the patient between your hands and place their head on the towel, and remove those teeth in which such escarps appear and cause similar sand within them from which no cause would remain, and this is due to blackness and yellowness and other colors that are changed."
Donc si es ostat aquo que es en aquelas del comensament de la razio, bo es; e sino, lahoras tu itera la razio sobre aquelas al autra dia e al segon e al tertz entro que vengua al derier stament en aquo que tu vols.	"So if that is what you want to achieve at the beginning of the reason, good. But if not, then repeat the reason over those on another day and the second and third until it comes to the final statement in what you want."
E sapias que las dentz han necessitat de motz rezoris de diversas formas e de motas figuras segon que es preparat a la tua operacio.	"And know that teeth require many different types of files with various shapes and figures, according to how your operation is prepared."
E per so quar le razori am le qual la dent es raza de la partida dedintz es autre del razori am le qual es ras entre las dentz segon autras formas, e aquestas formas de razoris sian deves tu preparadas las quals veyras tantost:	"And therefore choose the file with which the tooth is filed from the inside of the socket is different from the file with which it is filed between the teeth according to other forms, and these forms of files are those that you should prepare, which you will see soon:"
Capitol .xxx.	"Chapter XXX."
D’eradicacio de dentz.	"Of tooth extraction."
Cove que tu cures la dent de la sua dolor am tot engen e tardes en tota eradicacio de lu, quar no es denguna causa que suplisqua la veguada de lu quan es eradicada, quar es sustancia sublima entro que es excusacio en la eradicacio de lu.	"So that you cure the tooth of its pain with all care and diligence in every extraction of it, for there is no cause that should hinder the view of it when it is extracted, for it is a sublime substance that is exposed during the extraction of it."
Mays cove quan le malaute es forsat aquela dent eradicar, que fermament deves tu sia certificat quala es la dent dolent, quar motas veguadas la dolor descep le malaute e cuga que sia en dent sana, e tu eradicas aquela e aprop la dolor no cessa entro que la dent malauta e dolent sia eradicada, quar nos ja havem vist aquo per operacio dels barbies.	"But when it is necessary to extract that tooth, firmly you must be certain what the painful tooth is, for many times the pain deceives and seems to be in a healthy tooth, and you extract that one but the pain does not cease until the diseased and painful tooth is extracted, for we have already seen this through the operation of barbers."
Donc cum deves tu es sertificat qual es la dent dolent, e que o sabes be, lahoras cove que tu scarifiques en le circuit de la dent am spatum en le qual sia alcuna vertut, entro que sia dissolvut de la dent de la gingiva de tota partida, e aprop mau aquel am les tieus ditz, o am forfexs subtils al comensament petit a petit entro que aquela concucesquas.	"So when you are certain what the painful tooth is and know it well, then it is necessary that you scarify around the tooth with a spatula in which there is some virtue, until it is dissolved from the gum of the entire socket, and then slowly with your tweezers or with subtle forceps little by little until that concavity is reached."
E aprop alogua en lu fortz tenalhas grans per bona loquacio o estuptura fort, e pausa le cap del malaute entre les tieus denolhs que be le tengues que no·s maugua, e aprop tratz la dent segon rectitut en manieyra que no trenques aquela, ni al malaute major dolor no dones.	"And then apply strong forceps for good grasp or sturdy pressure and place the head of the diseased tooth between your fingers that you hold it well so that it does not move, and pull the tooth straight in such a way that you do not break it, nor cause greater pain to the sick."
E donc si no es foro-getat, lahoras pren un de aquels instrumentz, e met aquel dejos lu de tota part am facilitat e esforsa la remocio de lu ayssi que es feyt al comensament.	"And therefore if it is not forgotten, then take one of those instruments and place it on that side of all the parts with ease and effort, causing the removal of it as was done at the beginning."
Mays si la dent es trauquada o corrosa, lahoras cove que tu comples de drap aquel trauc e estrenguas aquel am la extremitat de ray subtil per so que no sia trinquada en la hora de la tua constriccio sobre aquela am tenalas.	"But if the tooth is loose or decayed, then it is necessary that you fill that cavity with cloth and strengthen it with the end of a thin needle so that it is not broken at the time of your traction on it with forceps."
E cove que tu obres exquesitament am scarificacio en le circuit de tota part de la gingiva e guarda mot la tua fortaleza que no trenques aquela e romangua partida de lu, e retorne sobre le malaute per la malicia que sia majo que la primieyra dolor de lu.	"And it is necessary that you work carefully with scarification around the entire gum and guard well your force so that you do not break it and leave a part of it behind, and return on the diseased one for the malice that may be greater than the first pain of it."
E guarda te que no fassas aquo que fan alscus ignorantz barbiers en lor fistinacio e audacia sobre la eradicacio de lor, ses que no aministran aquo que nos havem recomtat; quar motas veguadas fan venir sobre les homes malautias grans las quals son pus dificils que sian trinquadas, e las razitz de lor remaugudas totas, o alcunas de aquelas, o que extrayguas aquela am alcus osses de la mandigula ayssi cum motas veguadas havem testificat.	"And beware that you do not do what many ignorant and arrogant barbers do in their haste and boldness over the extraction of teeth, without administering what we have recommended; for many times they bring upon men great diseases which are more difficult to treat than if they had been broken, and the roots of them completely removed or some of those, or that they extract it with some bones of the jaw as we have often witnessed."
E aprop la eradicacio de lu sia lavada la boca am vi caut o vi agre am sal.	"And after the extraction of it, let the mouth be washed with warm wine or vinegar mixed with salt."
E si endeve fluxs de sanc per aysso, ayssi cum motas veguadas endeve, lahoras trissa alcuna quantitat de zegi e aspergeys sobre la plagua, e si no confereys aquel zegi, cauteriza.	"And if there is flow of blood from it, as often happens, then sprinkle some quantity of sage and pour it on the wound, and if that sage does not suffice, cauterize."
La forma de las forceps e tenalas subtils am las quals es mauguda la dent al comensament sia de longua extramitat, de breu manubre e gros, per so que no sian doblatz quan am aquels deves obrar.	"The shape of the strong and subtle forceps with which the tooth is grasped at the beginning should be of long extremity, short handle, and thick, so that they do not bend when you use them."
E sian ayssi cum vezes de gros manubre entro que quan estrenhas am aquelas no sian dobladas, sian breus extramitatz.	"And let them be such that when stretched with those, they are not bent, being short at the ends."
E sian faytas de ferr de India descentment faytas de dreytas extramitatz, e en las extramitatz de aquelas sian dentz de las quals las unas intron en las autras e estrenhan per constriccio descent fort, e alscunas veguadas las extramitatz de aquelas sian la forma del bec d’un auzel le qual ha nom ciconia, so es guanta, e son de fort constriccio.	"And let them be made of India steel, well-made with straight extremities, and at the ends of those have teeth which fit into each other and stretch by compression descent forcefully, and sometimes the extremities of those are like the shape of a bird's beak called 'ciconia', that is to say, they are strong in constriction."
Capitol .xxxi.	"Chapter xxxi."
De erradicacio de dentz e d‘estraccio dels osses de las mandibulas trincadas.	"Of the extraction of teeth and removal of the locked jawbones."
Quan deves la eradicacio de dent le qual es trinquat roman alcuna causa, lahoras cove que tu pauses sobre le loc coto am boder per un jorn o per dos entro que·l loc sia mollificat; e aprop entromet algesti o tenalhas las extramitatz de las quals so asembladas al bec de un auzel apelat ciconia o guanta, la forma de las forceps:	When tooth extraction is necessary due to some cause, then you should place your finger on the spot with pressure for one day or two until that area becomes softened; and then insert cloves or tweezers whose ends are shaped like those of a bird called the ciconia or owl, in the form of forceps.
Las extramitatz de lor sian faytas dedintz ayssi cum lima o alfagi.	The ends of them [the tweezers] should be made inside thus like a file or rasp.
E si no obediys a tu a eyssiment am aquestas forceps o tenalas, lahoras cove que tu caves sobre la razit e descrobas tota la carn e entrometas le instrument le qual ha nom atali, so es palanca petita del qual la forma es aquesta:	And if you do not succeed with this extraction using these forceps or tweezers, then you should cut around the root and strip off all the flesh and insert the instrument called "atali," which is a small lever whose shape is like this:
E sia de breu extremitat grossa un petit, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	And it should have a short, thick end that is not bent back, lest it be injured.
Donc si per aquo la razit es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, ajuda te am aquestz autres instrument dels quals aquestas son las formas: la forma del primier instrument es de triangulada extramitat en la qual sia alcuna grossesa:	If the root is not removed by this means, then it is good; and if not, help yourself with these other instruments whose shapes are as follows:
La forma del segon instrument es que sia de triangulada e de pus subtil extremitat.	"The second tool should be triangular in shape with a very fine tip."
E ja so ajudatz am aquest instrument havent dos ramps del qual aquesta es la forma aprop la seguent:	"And this is how you use this instrument, which has two branches whose shape is roughly as follows:"
e am autres instrumentz les quals precidero en rasura de dentz; quar juvament es fayt am aquest instrument le qual es asemblat a onci gran, e aquesta es la forma:	"And with other instruments that resemble a pair of large scissors, this is their shape:"
de la triangulada extremitat torta o curta, la qual sia alcuna grossesa, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	"of the triangular tip twisted or shortened, which should have some thickness and not be too sharp so as not to be easily bent."
E otra sapias que·ls instrumentz de las dentz motz so e semblantment les autres instruments.	"And you should know that instruments for extracting teeth are similar in shape to other instruments."
Mays le artifexs savi e subtil en l’art, atroba per si mateys segon aquo que a lu significa la operacio e las malautias diversas; quar son de las malautias a las quals les antics no diysero ni pausero propri instrument, per las formas de diversas specias.	"But skilled and subtle artisans in this art find for themselves according to what they understand the operation and various diseases. For there are diseases that ancient authors did not give or appoint any specific instruments for their varied forms."
Mays si es trinquat l’os de la mandibula o dels autres osses de la boca, o si poyreys, lahoras sia pes curat sobre aquel en son loc am aquo que es a lu convenient dels instrumentz e de las forceps las quals havem dit en la extraccio de las razitz de las dentz, e ajuda te am gesti del qual aquesta es la forma:	"But if the jawbone or other bones of the mouth are broken or fractured, then one should carefully operate on that area with whatever is convenient among the instruments and forceps mentioned earlier in the extraction of teeth roots, using this gesture whose shape is as follows:"
E sia en lu alcuna grosseza petit a petit, e sia instringida o tenguda am la boca per que no evasesca o fuga entro que l’os de tot sia foro-getat; e aprop restaura le loc am medicinas convenientz ad aquo.	"And one should gently and gradually widen it with some thickness, holding or squeezing it with the mouth so that it does not escape or slip until all of the bone is removed. Then apply medicine suitable to the area."
Mays si en l’os es petita poyredura, lahoras ratz aquel de aquela poyredura e de la sua negror, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	"But if there is a small fracture in the bone, then remove that part of the fracture and its darkness, and treat it until it heals."
Capitol .xxxii.	"Chapter XXXII."
De la cura de las dentz eminentz sobre las autras.	"Of the treatment of prominent teeth compared to others."
Quan las dentz so eminentz no segon lor cors natural per aquelas la forma es laga, e majorment quan endeve a las femnas, e majorment a las piuselas venerablas; donc cove que tu consideras: si dent es nada aprop autra dent, e no es possibla sarradura ni linament de lu, lahoras radica aquela; mays que no sia annexa am autra dent, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am aquest instrument del qual aquesta es la forma; e es semblant a morr de porc, e sia feyt de ferr de India de extramitat mot aguda.	When teeth protrude beyond their natural course due to form being distorted, especially in women and venerable elders; therefore you should consider: if the tooth is not adjacent to another tooth, and there is no possibility of extraction or splinting, then it must be removed. But if it is attached to another tooth, then you should cut it with this instrument whose shape resembles a pig's bristle made from Indian steel with an extremely sharp tip.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscideyses aquela en trops dias per la duricia de la dent, e que no sia comauguda autra de las dentz.	And may your incision be such that you cut through the tooth in three days due to its hardness, without harming any other teeth.
E si es dent eminent expausat a limadura, lahoras lima aquel am lima de ferr de India del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if it is an erupted tooth exposed to attrition, then grind that one with this Indian steel file whose shape is as follows:
E sia tot de ferr de India e·l margua eysament; e sia de motz menutz puntz ayssi cum lima am la qual son faytas agulhas, am la qual la dent sia limada pauc a pauc en motz dias am fecilitat, per so que no sia autra dent comauguda e caga.	And let it be made entirely of Indian steel and sharp-pointed; and let it have many fine points like those on a file used to grind the tooth little by little over several days with ease, so that no other teeth are harmed or injured.
E aprop lineys aquela en la fi, e ratz aquela am alscus razoris.	And when you have finished lining it up, straighten it with rubbing stones.
E si es dent del qual una partida es trinquada e lideys la lengua, lahoras cove que tu limescas aquel entro que l’aspretat de aquela fraccio sia ostada e engualhada, e sia aplenada per so que la lengua no ledesca ni la paraula no corrumpa.	And if it is a tooth where one portion is broken off and causes the tongue to lisp, then you should grind away that part until its sharpness is completely smoothed over and flattened out so that the tongue does not stumble nor speech become impaired.
Capitol .xxxiii.	Chapter XXXIII
De restauracio de dentz maugudas am fiel de aur o de argent.	Concerning the restoration of damaged teeth with gold or silver foil.
Quan accideys a las dentz devant concussio e remossio per percussio o per cazament, e le malaute no pot strenher sobre aquo que manga, e tu has curat aquel am medicinas stipticas, e no ha valgut la tua curacio, lahoras per so que no cagan es engen en aquelas que sian strengudas am fiel de aur e no de argent, quar argent se fa vert e aprop se poyreys aprop alscus dias, mays aur nul temps no es mudat.	When teeth are damaged due to concussion and removal by percussion or falling, and the patient cannot chew properly even after treatment with medicinal astringents, then you should fill those that are stricken with gold foil and not silver, because silver turns green over time and can tarnish in just a few days, whereas gold never changes.
E sia le fiel en tal subtilitat e grocesa segon la quantitat que puesca entrar entre las dentz; e la forma de la reccio es que prenguas le fiel e pren lo doble de lu entre doas dentz sanas, e aprop que cresques am doas tortuositatz del fiel entre doas maugudas, o si’ una o motas, entro que pervengua la tela a la dent sana del autra partida.	And let the foil be in such fineness and thinness according to the amount that can fit between the teeth. And the method of placement is as follows: take the foil and fold it in half lengthwise between two healthy teeth, and then wrap it around with two twists between the damaged teeth or just one if there are fewer, until the tissue reaches the sound part of the other tooth.
E aprop itera le teyssiment entro a la partida de la qual comenciest, e strenh la tua ma am facilitat e savieza entro que no sia mauguda.	And then press down firmly on that side where you began, using your hand with ease and skill so as not to damage the tooth.
E sia la tua striccio am la qual strenhas le fiel deves las razitz de las dentz que no evasesca.	And let your pressure be such that you secure the foil tightly between the roots of the teeth so that it does not become loose or dislodged.
E aprop inscindeys las extramitatz del fiel superfluens am las forceps o tosoyras, e agregua aquelas en quascun loc am gesti, e converteys aquelas e las occulta entre la dent sana e la dent mauguda, per so que no fassa lesio a la lengua.	And then trim the excess edges of the foil with forceps or scissors, and gather them up in each place with plaster, covering them up between the sound tooth and the damaged one so that they do not cause injury to the tongue.
E aprop leyssa aquela ayssi streyta cum roman.	And then let it remain thus for three days.
Mays si es desliada o rumpuda, strenh aquela o aquelas am autra fiel en tal manieyra en tot son temps.	But if it becomes loose or broken, reinforce it with more foil in this same manner whenever necessary.
E aquesta es la forma de las dentz e la figura de la rectacio de doas dentz sanas e de doas maugudas, ayssi cum vezes aquestas liadas:	And this is the method of preparing teeth and the technique for restoring two sound teeth and two damaged ones, as shown in these illustrations:
E quan se fa que retorno una dent o doas aprop le cazement de quascuna en lors locs, e sian recrescutz ayssi cum havem recomtat, e que remauguan.	And when it happens that a tooth or two are displaced by their own falling into their proper places, and have been restored as we have described, but still remain loose,
E no fa aquo sino bo artifexs e savi.	Then only does this happen to skilled and knowledgeable artisans.
E alcunas veguadas es aptat alcuna causa dels osses de vaca, e es fayt de lor ayssi cum forma de dent, e es pausada en loc en le qual defayl la dent, e es strengit ayssi cum havem dit, e reman e serveys am aquel per lonc temps.	Sometimes it happens that some of the bones of cattle are apt for this purpose, and they are fashioned into the shape of teeth and placed in the location where the tooth is missing, and secured as we have described, remaining in place and serving well for a long time.
Capitol .xxxiv.	Chapter XXXIV
De inscizio del liament le qual ve en la lengua e prohibeys loquela.	Concerning the incision of the frenulum which causes difficulty in speech.
Aquest liguament le qual ve dejos la lengua alcunas veguadas o es natural am le qual hom nays, o accidental e accideys per plagua la qual ja es consolidada.	This frenum, which attaches the tongue either naturally or accidentally due to scar tissue that has formed, may sometimes obstruct speech.
E la operacio en lu es que huobres la boca del malaute, le sieu cap existent en le tieu se; e eleva la sieua lengua, e aprop inscideys aquel liament nervos segon la latitut entro que sia solvuda la lengua de la sua recencio.	The operation is as follows: have the patient open their mouth while they are sitting upright with their head held still. Then lift up their tongue and cut that nerve frenum according to its width until the tongue is completely freed from its attachment.
Mays si en aquela es alcuna duricia o denodacio, e aquo es stat per consolidacio de plagua, lahoras tu gieta unci e scindeys aquel per la latitut entro que aias inscindit le liament e sia dissolvuda la nodacio.	But if there is hardness or firmness in that place due to scar tissue from an injury, then use tweezers and cut through it lengthwise until you have completely severed the frenum and dissolved the adhesion.
E guarda te que no sia fayta fissura en le preon de la carn e que scindas aqui arceria e vengua flux de sanc.	Be sure not to make a fissure in the front of the flesh, and avoid cutting too deeply or causing bleeding.
E aprop sia lavat le vestigi de la inscisio am ayguaros o am vi agre o am aygua frega; e aprop pausa dejos la lengua licini; so es meca la qual tengua le malaute dejos la lengua en quascuna nuoyt per so que no sia consolidat autra veguada.	Then rinse the wound with water or vinegar or warm water, and apply a bandage to the tongue. Tell the patient to keep their tongue away from that side for several days so that it does not heal again in that place.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, pausa sobre le loc vetriol trissat; mays si le sanc ventz, lahoras cauteriza le loc am cauteri lantiginos le qual conveneys ad aquo.	But if bleeding occurs, apply a lint bandage soaked in nitric acid to the area. If the bleeding continues, then cauterize the location with a silver nitrate cautery as appropriate for this situation.
E aprop aquel cura am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And then treat it with other remedies until it is healed.
Capitol .xxxv.	Chapter XXXV
De extraccio de ranula dejos la lengua.	Concerning the removal of a ranula from under the tongue.
Alcunas veguadas accideys dejos la lengua apostema asemblant a nomla petita prohibent la lengua de la sua operacio natural; e fort leu es magnificada entro que huempla la boca.	Sometimes, a tumor resembling a small mollusk develops under the tongue and interferes with its normal function. This can grow large enough to fill the entire mouth.
E la operacio en lu es que huebras la boca del malaute sesent devant le solel e considera le apostema.	The procedure is as follows: have the patient open their mouth facing the sun, then examine the tumor.
E si tu le vezes de fusca color o de negra, dur, al qual le malaute no atroba sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel quar es cranc.	If you find it to be of dark or black color, hard, and insentient to the patient, then do not touch it as it is a cancer.
E si es declinat a blancor, en le qual es humiditat, lahoras tu met le onci en lu, e inscideys aquel am spatum subtil, e inscindeys le de tota partida; e si sanc te ventz en la hora de la tua operacio, lahoras tu pausa desus zegi trissat, so es vetriol, entro que sia restreyt le sanc.	But if it is fluctuant and white, then use tweezers to compress it and cut through it with a fine scalpel, making sure to cut all the way around. If bleeding occurs during the procedure, apply a lint bandage soaked in nitric acid to restrict the flow of blood.
E aprop retorna a la obra tua entro que lo haias trayt am compliment de lu, entro que sia lavat am vi agre e sal; e cura aquel am l’autra curacio ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	Then return to your work until you have completed it with care, rinsing the area with vinegar and salt. Then treat it with other appropriate remedies until it is healed.
Capitol .xxxvi.	Chapter XXXVI
De extraccio de apostema de doas aurelhas e de aquel que es nada en le golayro e de las autras apostemas.	"Of removing an abscess from both ears and that which is located in the navel, as well as other abscesses."
Quan endeveno en le golayro godat, so son glandulas las quals son asembladas algodat, las quals accideysso deforas e son nompnadas doas aurelhas, las quals quan tu las curas am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no es sanat, lahoras tu considera si le apostema es dur, de fusca color, de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr.	"When an abscess occurs in the navel, it is called a gland that forms sometimes there. It happens externally and is named 'both ears'. If you cure it with what we have said in the division and it does not heal, then consider if the abscess is hard, dark-colored, and insensitive to touch; do not touch it with iron."
E si es de roga color e la razic es grossa, lahoras no toques aquela am ferr per le flux del sanc; abantz layssa aquel entro sia madurat, e lahoras o tu trauqueras aquel, o sira romput per si.	"If it is of red color and the root is large, then do not touch it with iron due to the flow of blood. Rather let it ripen inside, and then you will draw it out or else it will break open by itself."
E si es de blanqua color, radon, e la razit de lu es subtil, lahoras aquel es que cove esser inscidit.	"If it is white in color, hard, and its root is thin, then it should be incised."
E la operacio en lu es que consideras, denant la tua operacio, si ja ha repausat le apostema de lu caut am repaus complit o si es deminuit am alcuna deminucio; e lahoras fay sezer le malaute denant le soleyl, e·l cap de lu sia en le tieu se, e huebre la boca de lu, e le servidor prenent entre las suas mas prema la lengua de lu dejos am instrument mot noble del qual aquesta es la forma:	"And the operation in this case is to consider first whether the abscess has already ruptured and healed completely with rest or if it has decreased somewhat. Then make the incision before sunrise, with the patient's head towards the east and their mouth open. The assistant should take a clean cloth and press the tongue of the patient gently with an instrument called the 'mouth holder,' which is shaped like this:"
E sia fayt de argent o de aram, e sia subtil cum cotel.	"And it should be made of silver or brass, and it should be sharp with a knife."
Donc cum tu premes am aquel la lengua e es mostrat a tu la apostema, e catz sobre aquel le tieu vezement, lahoras pren onci e fica aquel en l’amenla, e tira aquel a las partidas defora tant quant podes.	"Then when you press the patient's tongue with that instrument and expose the abscess, cut it with your knife very gently. Then take a forceps and grasp it and put it in the wound, and pull it outwards as much as possible."
Otra aquo que tiras alcuna causa de las tunicas, e aprop incideys aquela am instrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	"After that, if you pull out some of its tunics, then immediately cut them with this instrument whose shape is like this:"
e es asemblat a forceps, empero las extramitatz de lu son corvadas, ayssi que l’orrifici de quascuna de aquelas es en le endreyt del autra, mot agudas, le qual sia de ferr indi enbegut.	"It resembles a forceps, but its extremities are curved so that the points of each one face towards the other, very sharp. It should be made of iron carefully engraved."
Mays si aquest instrument no es a tu present, lahoras inscideys aquel am spatum del qual aquesta es la forma de lu: E sia agut de la una part, no agut del autra part.	"But if this instrument is not available, then incise it with a scalpel whose shape is like this: It should be sharp on one side and not sharp on the other."
E pus que has inscidit una mella, inscideys l’autra segon aquesta meteyssa manieyra de inscizio, e aprop la inscizio le malaute guarguarise de aygua frega	"And after you have made one incision, make another according to this same manner of incision. Then wash the wound with clean water."
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, guarguarise aygua de decoccio de scorsa de milgrana o de fuelha de mirtra e semblantz ad aquel de las causas stiptiquas entro que·l flux del sanc sia restreyt, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	"But if there is bleeding from the wound, wash it with water decocted from oak bark or myrtle leaves and other astringent substances to stop the flow of blood. Then treat it until it heals."
E alcunas veguadas naysso en le guolayro autras apostemas otra aquelas doas aurelhas, e inscideys aquelas segon que yeu e dit en la inscizio de doas mellas engualment.	"And sometimes other abscesses appear near those two ears, and you should incise them according to what I have said about the incision of two equal wounds."
E yeu ja fu medicat una femna de apostema le qual era nat en le golayro de lu, le qual apostema tendia a color fusca, de pauc sentiment, le qual ja havia claus le golayro de lu, e la femna respirava am meat streyt, e ja havia prohibit a lu comestio e beure de aygua, e ja era pervenguda a la mort si mays agues stat per un dia o per dos.	"And I already treated a woman who had an abscess that appeared on her throat, which was dark in color with little sensation. She had closed the wound herself and was breathing with great difficulty, and she had been prohibited from eating or drinking water for several days. She was already near death if not treated within one or two days."
E l’apostema ja tant havia pugat que havia mezes dos ramps entro que eyssiro per dos traucs.	"And the abscess had swollen so much that it had formed two large lumps, which discharged through two holes."
Donc yeu me cuytegui fisturalment e fiquegui en un de lor onci, e tiregui aquel, e atirada es de lu gran porcio, e aprop yeu incidigui aquela de on comprendegui del autre trau, e aprop yeu obrigui la boca de lu, e compremegui la sua lengua, e aprop yeu fiquegui le onci en aquela apostema.	"So I opened it with forceps and gripped one of them, and pulled it out. A large portion of the abscess came out, and then I made an incision where I understood the other hole was, and I opened her mouth and pressed down her tongue, and then I put a forceps in that abscess."
E aprop yeu abscizi gran partida de lu, e no corria de lu sino un pauc de sanc.	"And then you should cut off a large part of it, and if there is not much bleeding from it."
Donc absolut es le guolayro de aquela femna, e comensec tantost beure aygua, e aprop presec vianda, donc yeu no cessegui inscidir de aquela apostema motas vetz per lonc temps, e succesia apostema en loc de aquel, le qual inscizia entro que es prolonguat aquel.	"Therefore the woman's throat was completely healed, and she immediately began to drink water and eat food. However, I continued to incise that abscess many times over a long period of time, and it succeeded in forming another abscess in its place, which elongated that incision."
Donc yeu engen agui e cauterizegui le guolayro de lu, donc astec de addicio; e aprop yeu perambulegui e no saubi que fec Dieus de aquela aprop mi.	"So I took hot water and cauterized her throat, therefore stopping the addition of new flesh. And then she walked around, and I did not know what God had done through me."
Capitol .xxxvii.	"Chapter XXXVII."
De inscizio de huvela quan es apostemada.	"When the navel becomes inflamed."
Quan catarr deysen a la huvula, e es apostemada e es longa, lahoras ela es nompnada perpendicular; e si es en la partida dejos grossa e redonda, e lahoras ela es apelada buba.	"When catarr descends to the navel and it becomes inflamed and elongated, at times it is called perpendicular; but if it is thick and round at its base, at times it is called 'bubble'."
Mays quan es curada am aquo que havem dit en la divisio, e no comfereys la tua curacio, e eyssament ja vezes que apostema caut ja es ostat de lu e es subtil, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquela que es agreguadas redonda; e si es ad aquela longitut, e es sanguina, de fusca color o de negre, e no es a lu centiment, lahoras cove que tu temtes la inscizio de lu, quar en aquela es temor sobre le malaute.	"If the inflammation is cured with what we have said in this division and your treatment does not confirm it, and especially if an abscess has already burst open and become thin, then you should incise the one that is aggregated roundly. And if it is as long as that, and there is bleeding of dark or black color, without any sensation at all, then you should beware of this incision, for in such cases there is fear about the patient's condition."
E quan tu vezes aquela segon la manieyra que yeu he dita de la sua blancor e longuesa, que tu fassas sezer le malaute e premas la lengua de lu am instrument del qual procesic la sua forma e aprop fica le onci en la nuva, e tira aquela en jos e inscideys aquela am un de dos instrumentz les quals e ditz en la inscizio de dos mellas.
